"The Fashion Catalog":
"The Fashion Catalog is a catalog that lets players register and share their favorite character designs and show off their fashion sense.

It can be found by opening the Main Menu and selecting Personal."

"You can look up the outfits of other players, or register and share your own.

You can also \"Like\" outfits that appeal to you, and Favorite them for later viewing."
"You can view Likes sent to you by Catalog viewers by opening the Main Menu, selecting <yellow>Communication<c>, then selecting \"Communication History\"."
